title: Holby City spoilers: David Ames teases Dom and Lofty heartache
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Holby City’s David Ames has teased there’s even more heartache for Dom and Lofty (Lee Mead) around the corner and honestly, we don’t know if we’ll be able to handle it if these two end their relationship. The couple have been put through their paces in recent months with the baby drama and Dom learning that his mum is actually Ange Godard (Dawn Steele) – and it looks like things won’t be slowing down anytime soon.

Speaking exclusively to Metro.co.uk on the red carpet at this year’s Inside Soap Awards, David teased what’s on the horizon for Dofty.

‘There’s quite a lot of drama coming up at the moment,’ he began.

‘It’s a pretty huge storyline, it’s going to affect quite a few people and we’ve been doing it for quite a few months.’

He continued: ‘It’s been a very tumultuous time for both of them.

‘Obviously with my character finding out that Dawn [who plays Ange] is his birth mother and having his abusive ex-partner coming back into the show, that’s been a pretty hefty period of time.

‘We’ve both individually had our own little dramas going on and consequently, that goes on to affect the relationship.’

David Ames has given us the lowdown on what’s in store (Picture: PA)

When the truth comes out about Dom’s own struggles, the relationship is going to strain with David telling us: ‘It’s definitely a complete shock to Lofty and the situation and absolutely sends him into a spin, understandably so, especially because I knew about it beforehand and Dom hasn’t said anything about it for his own good reasons.

‘There’s definitely some hefty festive drama to come over December and January time.’

Brace yourselves, folks. It’s going to be one hell of a ride.
